293b6(nyi): wang bcas// 'khor bcas 'di yi dbang cig pu la sbyin// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ a mr-i ta kut+tA li a b+hi Shik+Shu a/ khro chen khams gsum rnam rgyal
293b7(nyi): ni// gnod sems rnam par dag pa ste// yum chen gsod ma skul 'khril// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// sprul pa ngo ma dang sre mor bcas// 'khor bcas 'di yi dbang
294a1(nyi): cig pu la sbyin// dbang ldan 'dul mchog thob par shog/ tre lokyo bi dza ya a b+hi Shi k+Shu a/ khro bo chen po stobs po che// brnab sems rnam par dag pa
294a2(nyi): ste// yum chen bskyod ma sku la 'khril// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// sprul pa dom dang byi bar bcas// 'khor bcas 'di yi dbang cig pu la sbyin// sa bdag
294a3(nyi): 'dul ba'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ ma hA ba la a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ shar sgor bu shud mgo can ni// rtag lha gnas su dag pa ste// mthing nag 'dzin pa'i lcags kyu bsnams/
294a4(nyi): byams pa chen po'i dbang thob shog/ oM badz+ra bag shag ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ b+h+yo sgor skye ka'i mgo can ni// chang lha gnas su dag pa ste// 'dren byed ser mo zhags pa bsnams/
294a5(nyi): snying rje chen po'i dbang thob shog/ oM badz+ra bar be she a b+hi'iShiny+tsa a/ nub sgor srin bya'i mgo can ni// bdag tu 'dzin pa dag pa ste// sdom byed dmar nag lcags sgrog
294a6(nyi): bsnams// dga' ba chen po'i dbang thob shog/ oM badz+ra A mr-i ta a b+hi Shi ny+tsa A/ byang skor khra yi mgo can ni// mtshan mar lta ba dag pa ste// rAg byed ljang nag bri bu
294a7(nyi): bsnams// btang snyoms chen po'i dbang thob shog/ oM badz+ra mar na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ zhes bya ba ni rang rtags phyag rgya'i dbang ngo // de nas yang de dag gi
294b1(nyi): rgyan chas kyi dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing // byang chub sems ni mngon du bstan// khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// sbrul rigs/
294b2(nyi): lngas dbang bskur ro// oM AHhUM swA hA a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ e mang ni rang byung ste// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// 'khor ba yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir// ye shes sems
294b3(nyi): dpas dbang bskur ro// dz+nyA na sa twa kI li a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// pha rol phyin pa drug gi rtags// rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan gyis// rgyud drug gnas
294b4(nyi): nas sgrol bar ro shog/ badz+ra badz+ra a ni tri shu li/ kI la ya a b+hi Shany+tsa a/ skam po chos sku ra ri longs spyod rdzogs// rlon pa sprul pa'i sku yin te// dus gsum sangs rgyas
294b5(nyi): bzhugs pa kun// sku gsum ngo bor dbang bskur ro// ma hA kA pa la a b+hi Shi ny+tsa hUM/ sbrulo rigs bzhi yi tshul khrims 'dis// mnyen la 'khril bas sku yi brgyan// zhe sdang
294b6(nyi): chen po'i rang bzhin pas// 'phrin las rnam pa nas gdug pa zhi bar shog/ ma hA ga na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ glang chen ko rlon stobs chen brjid las ldan// tshul khrims g.yang gzhi
294b7(nyi): thabs la mkhas pa dang // stag lpags sham thabs dpa' bar ldan pa yi// na bza' rgyan gyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ ba bid kun d+ha li bya gri tsa na ma/ d+ha rmaka ko ta a b+hi ShiH

295a2(nyi): yin/ rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ badz+ra ba ra be a b+hi Shik+Shu a/ khams nag ral pas stong nyid don rtogs te// mthing nag ral pa'i chun 'phyang gi/ 'khor

295a6(nyi): gsum gyi don dam mtshon par shog/ ma hA sdig ta/ ma hA rak+Sha/ ma hA kang ni ri ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ ye shes gcig las ma g.yos kyang // gdul thabs tha dad bstan pa'i

295b7(nyi): ma hA laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas 'dis// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod cing mnyes// 'gro ba'i don la thugs dam bskul// mchod sbyin stobs kyi dbang
296a1(nyi): mchog thob par shog/ ma hA pu tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bsgrub pa'i ye shes mtshon gang po// gsang ba'i sngags kyi sa rab bskyed la// dus gsum rgyun du bzlas
296a2(nyi): dgos pas// 'dzab bsnyen 'di yis dbang bskur ro// badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shi k+Shu a/ zhes bya ba ni bsgrub rdzas kyi dbang bskur ba'o// de yang drag po sgrol ba'i dbang 'di
296a3(nyi): gsungs so// dbyings dang ye shes don dam pho nya dang // thabs dang shes rab rtags kyi pho nya dang // 'khor ba'i gnas nas dgra bgegs dgug pa'i phyir// mngag pa pho nyi

296a6(nyi): thabs mchog mtshan ma'i phur pas 'debs par shog/ ti b+ha tsakra ma ra ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ mtshon cha lnga ldan phur pa 'di byin pas// 'joms byed rdo rje gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang /

296b2(nyi): yu dz+nyA na puSh+TiM ku ru a b+hi Shi ny+tsa a/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje khro bo'i the tshogs kyis// 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyangs pa'i phyir// mtshan ma rdul du rlog par shog/ tad+ya thA

296b4(nyi): pU tsa mA ra ya a b+hiShiny+tsa a/ dbang mchog dug gi gtor ma 'di byin pas// gnod sbyin ma lus myos shing tshub pa dang // bag chags sbyang zhing sdig pa 'thol 'gyur nas// myos 'tshub
296b5(nyi): chol dang smyo ru 'dzud par shog/ ha la ha la mA ra ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rdo rje srin po'i zhal gdangs par// sha khrag rus pa'i mchod pa yis// dug gsum sku gsung thugs dang ldan par shog/
296b6(nyi): b+hin+na ya badz+ra yak+Sha kro ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ glong yang 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// 'bar 'phros 'du glong me sbar te// ya ma me yi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams ma lus mnyes byed shog/ ag ne de ba
296b7(nyi): shr-i pu tsa a b+hi Shin+ya a/ zil gnon ri rab bur ba 'di byin pas// las ngan skal med byur ngan dus pang rnams// byang chub sems ni nam yang ma skyes par// gnon byed stobs kyis dbang
297a1(nyi): mchog thob par shog/ oM badz+ra staM pa na na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ zhes bya ba ni drag po sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i
297a2(nyi): dbang bskur ba'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa yis// gsum gsum dgu ru gsung ba yang // mi 'dra'i phyir na gcig tu med// de bas 'di la'ang de 'drar brtag
297a3(nyi): byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas ltar// ji ltar rgyal bas mchod pa bzhin// bdag kyang de 'drar bsgrub pa'i phyir// byang chub chen po bdag la gsol// slob mas shes rab tha ma la// phul
297a4(nyi): la yang ni gsol ba gdab// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// don chen zab mos nyon mongs 'joms// thabs mchog gsang ba'i khyad par can// de ring bdag la dbab par
297a5(nyi): zhu/ de rjes bla ma lung ldan des// bdag gi snying kha'i hUM las ni// 'od 'phros lcags kyus bde gshegs bkug/ thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs nas// chags pa rdo rje'i
297a6(nyi): nga rgyal bya// bskyod pas bde gshegs 'od du zhu// rdo rje b+ha ga'i nang na ni// rin po che yi gnas yod de// gnas pas pha zad nur ba dag/ rgyu ba'i dbugs bkag sems gzung
297a7(nyi): nas// bu 'dir shog cig rigs kyi bu// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas su// rdo rje rgyal po rab drangs te// dbu yi nam mkha'i dkyil du ni// mtheb srin gnyis kyi sa
297b1(nyi): lam bkag la// longs spyod nang du bzhugs su gsol// e mang ni rang byung ba'i// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// 'khor ba dbyings nas bsgral ba'i phyir// byang chub sems
297b2(nyi): kyis dbang bskur ro// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi 'dis// sems kyi sdug bsngal rnams 'joms te// gsang ba'i gnas nas dam par bcas// de ring khyod la dbab par
297b3(nyi): bya// de ring sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// bdag ni bsod nams skal ba che// yon tan kun gyis bdag la brgyan// bde bar gshegs pa'i bdag nyid do// e ma re bde la
297b4(nyi): gsum brjod// sbrang rtsi lhag lus yan chad gzhi ba// de rjes lung bstan thob par bya// zhes pa 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o// de nas yang shes
297b5(nyi): rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur 'di gsungs so// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// ngo bo nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// khams gsum bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/
297b6(nyi): 'dren pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal ba stod// dngos grub zhing la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchog gi dbang phyug khyod kyis kyang // shes rab dang ni ye shes kyi// dbang bskur dam pa
297b7(nyi): bdag la stsol// zab mo'i dbang chen bdag la stsol// de nas rigs kyi bu mo ni// gzhung las byung ba'i mtshan dang ldan// bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dam// med na nyi
298a1(nyi): shu lon pa'ang rung // de las 'das na dngos grub med// dar la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// spos mchog dri dang ldan byas nas// dad pas bla ma la yang
298a2(nyi): dbul// mgon po chen po 'di mtshar to// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di mtshar to// 'di ni yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// dngos grub mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// de nas bla ma lung
298a3(nyi): ldan des// bskyed nas rdzogs pa'i mthar thug bya// pad+ma skur ba'i sbyor ba yang // gong du ji ltar smos pa bzhin// 'di ni khyod kyi gzungs ma'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis
298a4(nyi): brten par gsungs// 'khor lo'i rim pa rab sbyar bas// 'gro ba gsum po dag pa 'di// sangs rgyas nyid la thabs gzhan med// de bas 'di yi sbyor bral bar// khyod kyis
298a5(nyi): nam yang ma gtang zhig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spongs na// de la dngos grub mchog nyid med// de
298a6(nyi): brjod bsnol la de ji bzhin// shes rab dam pa'i dbang zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo // de nas yang ye shes kyi dbang 'di gsungs so// gur
298a7(nyi): kum chu sogs dri zhim dang // me tog 'phreng ba la sogs ldan// gos med langs te pad phye la// gsal byas mthong nas 'di skad brjod// dri chen dri chu za nus sam// khrag dang khu ba de
298b1(nyi): bzhin sha/ bud med dad pas rten nus sam// pad+ma b+ha gar 'o byed pa// ci bde bar ni bu khyod smros// kye ma lha mo cis mi nus// khrag dang khu ba sogs za zhing // rtag tu bud med brten
298b2(nyi): par bgyi// b+ha ga 'o byed mi rtog go/ de nas dga' mgu dang ldan pas// pad+ma skur ba'i cho ga bya// mdoms slong chu skyes phye nas ni// e ma bdag gi pad+ma yis// thams cad
298b3(nyi): bde dang yang dag ldan// gang zhig cho gas rten byed na// de yi mdun du bdag 'dug go// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur sogs// 'di ltar pad+ma'i bya ba bgyid// rang
298b4(nyi): nyid rgyal po bde chen po// 'di nyid la ni rtag tu bzhugs// b+hak+Shu mo k+Sha hA/ bde tshan 'khor lo'i dbus na ni// ston pa'i yi ge hau gyi gzugs// ye shes me yis rab 'phros
298b5(nyi): pas/ dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag/ 'khor lo bzhi la rim bzhin babs// rdo rje rtsa dmar dga' ba skyes// dkyil du sbyin pa mchog dga' yin// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i
298b6(nyi): dbus su ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung // gang der skyes pa'i ya shes ni// gzugs dang kha dog mtshan nyid bral// 'dod chags ma yin chags bral yin// dbu mar
298b7(nyi): dmigs su med pa ste// sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha' la// ye shes bde bar gnas mi gtang // thun mtshams gcig gam nyin gcig la// zla phyed zla ba bskal pa stong //
299a1(nyi): gnas der ye shes nam mkha' gzung // de yang rgyu yi ye shes yin// gal te bsdams pas ma thebs na// pad+ma'i gnas su lhung ba'i tshe// bral ba'i
299a2(nyi): dga' ba zhes bya ste// nor bu chu skyes las bton nas// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rang bzhin de// dkyil 'khor spyan ras gzigs kyis blang // khu ba shes rab ces su bshad// bde ba
299a3(nyi): ye shes ngo bo nyid// rin chen rtse mo chos 'byung du// 'dug pa chos kyi sku zhes bya// cung zhig byung nas bltar mngon pas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya// de las
299a4(nyi): g.yo ba'i sems byung tshe// phyir spros sprul pa'i sku zhes bya// dra bas mtshon pa'i tshul can no// zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang ngo // de nas yang
299a5(nyi): 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dbang 'di gsungs so// snga ma'i sbyor ba la brten nas// zin pa shes rab tsas su bshad// song ba ye shes rjes su dran// tshur 'ong ba ni lnga pa'o// sems
299a6(nyi): ma bskyed par bde ba che// sems ni don las gzhan du yang // 'gyur ba ma yin don nyid do// phyi yi rtags su bstan pa ni// yul gyi dngos po thams cad la// sgyu ma lta bu'i
299a7(nyi): sems 'byung zhing // yul gyi rnam par mi 'dzin na// rtags ni mngon shes lnga yang 'char// de meng bar du rab tu 'bad// blo yi rim pas gnyis su 'char// de la goms
299b1(nyi): par gyur pa dang // dngos po gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// phyi nang gnyis ka rnam par dag/ byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis rdzogs//
299b2(nyi): ci yang med las cir yang snang // mtshan nyid brtag cing bstan du med// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag/ rang byung ye shes chen po pas// 'bras bu mthar phyin dbang zhes bya'o//
299b3(nyi): de dag spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// gnas lnga thabs lnga 'bras bu lnga// lam lnga sa lnga ngo bo lnga// rigs 'dzin lnga la sogs pa rnams// go rims gdams ngag shes par bya//
299b4(nyi): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje me lce 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan
299b5(nyi): 'das mnga' dbang yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bsam mi khyab pa'i las rnams la// thugs rje thabs kyi khyad par gyis// 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji
299b6(nyi): lta bar/ 'thun 'jug thabs su snang bar mdzod// ces gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje thabs kyi gtso bo badz+ra kI la yas thugs kyi yon tan 'phrin las kyi rdzu
299b7(nyi): 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan nas/ karma kI la ya la bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya tha ma'i gang zag la// mos pa'i yul dang bsam pa'i cha// tha dad mi mthun bye brag gis// thams cad
300a1(nyi): brjod par gal nus// re zhig rim pa mdor bsdun// phan par bya ba'i thabs rnams ni// gtso ru bshad kyi yang dag nyon// sgrub pa spyiyi slob dpon gyis// bang
300a2(nyi): dbang bar chad med pa'am// nags tshal mang po gtibs pa ru// las kyi bya ba sngon btang bas// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang tshad du bya// srang bus gdab cing tshon byes dgyes// 'phrin
300a3(nyi): las rnam bzhi'i rim pa yis// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor tha snyad tsam// e wang ma ya zhes su bshad// phur pa'i dbyibs dang thab khung dang // dbus kyi pho brang yum gyi mkha'// yi ge'i
300a4(nyi): dbyibs kyis mtshon par bya'o// rin chen zur brgyad dkyil 'khor du// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad tshad// bco lnga'am nyi shu rtsa gcig la// byin gyis brlab cing dgod bya ste// bsnyen
300a5(nyi): pa lnga 'bum drug 'bum mam// bdun 'bum las su rung byas nas// sngags 'di nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM su ru su ru u tsu sa ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ gang gis klu yi gnas su gdab// klu
300a6(nyi): rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur// gal te byung nas de las thar// dkyil 'khor pho brang zlum po la// klu gang yin pa'i gzugs byas la// gan rgyal dag tu shar phyogs bstan//
300a7(nyi): hUM gnyis ming dang sA hA'i mthar// g.yo ba'i rdzas la gur kum gyis// legs bris snying khar glan pa'am// gzugs med mig gi steng du gdag// bdag nyid shar du kha bltas la// ni
300b1(nyi): phur ba dag la ni// byin gyis brlab cing lha rnams dgod// rgya mdud dag gi ngos dag la// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal dgod// shar lho 'dod pa'i rgyal po la// lhor ni gshin rje
300b2(nyi): gshed po dgod// lho nub mtshams su mi g.yo mgon// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal po bsam// nub byang mtshams su bdud rtsi 'khyil// byang nyid du ni stobs po che// byang shar don yod
300b3(nyi): zhags pa dgod// gzhan yang byin gyis brlabs pa ni// sngon 'gro'i sbyor ba ji lta bar// thams cad thams cad bya bar bshad// de nas 'das pa'i cho ga ni// ha las rdo rje rgya gram
300b4(nyi): dbus/ ta a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// kha dog dkar po dza bsams te// lcags kyu la sogs phyag rgya bzhis// yang nas yang du smin par bya// oM dza hUM baM ho/ che ge mo zhig pra
300b5(nyi): be sha ya hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya stau hUM phaT/ ci nus nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // lan bdun dag ste go rim bzhin// zhi bar bsam zhing gtor ma sbyin// de
300b6(nyi): nas rgyas par 'dod pa na// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ser por bya// klu yi gzugs kyang dmar ser la// mgo bo byang gi phyogs su bstan// bdag kyang dmar ser byang du blta// yi ge pu shI
300b7(nyi): dang bcas pa// gang yin gnas su legs bkod la// thams cad gong gi tshul 'drar brtag/ dbang du bsdu bar 'dod pa na// dkyil 'khor zla baM dmar po la// gang 'dod gzugs kyang
301a1(nyi): dmar rgyuH// tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba yi// g.yo ba'i rdzas la ming bris glan// mgo bo nub phyogs dag tu bstan// bdag nyid nub phyogs pa bltas la/
301a2(nyi): snying khar ma las nyi ma'i steng // dzaM las lcags kyu la sogs pas// gang 'dod dbang du gyur par bya// 'khor lo phyag rgya bcas nas kyang // sngags 'di gi shu rtsa gcig tu// shin
301a3(nyi): ts+ya drag par rab tu bzlas// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la gan can/ dargyad ha/ btsapa tsa/ b+han+d+hab+h+yan+tu/ tshin+d+ra n+tu/ rban dzan/ bi ngan sa ma ya/ dza nyi lam po d+ha rA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha yats+tsha
301a4(nyi): hUM phaT/ de bzlas gang 'dod bran bzhin du// bsams te gtor ma dmar po sbyin// gal te gtan 'pho'i las byed na// gru gsum rtse mo lhor bstan la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum
301a5(nyi): brtsegs tshul// bcu gnyis sang ni zhing thal dang // lan tshwa skye tshe zhing chen khrag/ tshub ma'i lo ma shun pa dang // khre dang grog mkhar sa dag dang // bong bu'i bdud rtsi bsres la sgyu//
301a6(nyi): yang na til las gzhi blangs la// gzugs dang kha dog stug por bya// mgo bo g+ho yi phyogs su bstan// bdag kyang de bzhin la bltas la// g.yo ba'i rdzas la ming rus bri// lcags
301a7(nyi): kyi bur ba rnam snga la// sras mchog lnga ru rab bskyed la// gong gi gsang sngags khri bzlas te// las su rung nas gnas lngar gang ba// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// oM badz+ra la/
301b1(nyi): kro d+ha kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha hU~M hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ de bzlas phung po zhal du rngub// gtor ma nag po byas te gtang // las 'di rtsom pa'i rim pa yang // mar gyi bcu
301b2(nyi): bdun nas bzung nas// mar ngo'i cha la las rnams ni// nyi ma'i gung ngam nam gung nas// brtsams te bdun gsum bar du bsgrub// tha ma gtan 'pho gnas su bskyal// de
301b3(nyi): nas phur pa bkru ba dang // gtang rag gtang zhing gtor ma dgye// grub pa'i tshad dang ldan mi ldan// las su rung ba'i phur pa de// khang pa'i steng du btab gyur na// char dang sprin
301b4(nyi): dang rlung mi ldang // de yi rim pa'ang 'di lta ste// dbang gi dkyil 'khor zla gam la// tsan dan dmar po 'am btsag gis byug/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// brgya rtsa brgyad du
301b5(nyi): sngags bzlas la// snying khar btab na 'grub par nges// rlung nag bcad par 'dod na yang // 'jim pa dag la rlung lha'i gzugs// dud kha sha ba zhon pa la// g.yas na rlung
301b6(nyi): yab thogs pa ni// byas na nub phyogs kha bltas te// g.yo ba'i rdzas la tsan dan gyis// hUM rba na yaM rba na hUM/ de bris snying khar gzhug par bya// bdag nyid rta mgrin rgyal po
301b7(nyi): rubasams te kha yang nub phyogs blta// snying bar ma las nyi dkyil 'khor// dza las 'od 'phros rlung lha bzung // dgug bcings bsdams te dbang du byed// sprin rnams
302a1(nyi): yongs su bsdus nas ni// bur pa'i 'og tu thim par brtags// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yis// gnad la bor zhing dam tshig bsgrags// ma chad bar du
302a2(nyi): sngags 'di bzlas// oM na ga yaM ba hUM hriM/ de bzlas las su rung ba dang // mtha' yi las rnams gong bzhin sbyar// gzhan gyi zhing la btab gyur na// sman dang 'bru rnams mi skye ste/
302a3(nyi): bdag gi zhing la bsdu 'dod na// bdag gi gnas su ser po yi// dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa// phur bu zur ni drug pa la// gsang sngags nyi shu brgyad du bzlas// nyi ma'i
302a4(nyi): du dza bsam ste// lcags kyus 'bras bu rnams bkug nas// bdag gi gnas su thim par bya// pha rol gnas su dkyil 'khor ni// zla gam byas te phur pas gdab// nyi ma'i
302a5(nyi): steng du phaT bsam la// spro bsdus gzi byin 'bar bsams te// gtor ma dmar po gtang bar bya// rgyas pa'i gtor ma'ang de bzhin sbyin// ldumar 'am ni nags tshal du//
302a6(nyi): bta ba na me tog 'bras mi skye// khyim sgor btab na stongs par 'gyur// ri la btab na ri nyil lo// chu la bta ba na slar la zlog/ 'bab chu khron pa rdzi nga bu dang // wa chu dang ni chu mig
302a7(nyi): tu/ btab na skams shing stong par 'gyur// grong khyer dag gi sgor btab na// grong khyer 'jig cing dmag tshogs 'joms// rgyal po'i sgo ru btab pa na// dmag dpung 'jig
302b1(nyi): cing rgyal srid 'phrog/ dur khrod dag tu btab pa na// gang la btab pa nad kyi sa 'dzin// phyung na de dag kun las thar// stobs chen las rnams shis pa'i mis// tsan dan dag gi
302b2(nyi): phur bu ni// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// oM badz+ra aM gu sha dza/ bco brgyad dag tu bzlas bya ste// lha khang dag tu btab gyur na// brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyis//
302b3(nyi): dbang sbyin bsrung dang sba ba dang // rtag tu nan tan chen por byed// tsher ma can gyi shing bu la// phur pa sor drug tshad du bya// oM badz+ra rba na rba na hUM phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas

302b5(nyi): 'gyur/ gtor ma'i las ni shin tu 'bad// sman shing phur pa sor bzhi la// oM ta ta sa na Na khro ta hUM phaT/ lnga brgya dag tu bzlas btab na// bang ba dag gam dkor mdzod dam//

303a1(nyi): 'gyur/ rtsod dang g.yul shags 'gyed pa dang // de rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dpung gi tshogs rnams ngag mi non// rta na gar lug pa la sogs//
303a2(nyi): phyugs rar btab na 'phel bar 'gyur// lam gyi bzhi mdor btab pa na// mi rgod la sogs bcings par 'gyur// thang shing phur pa sor drug la// su tir dzi na dza tur hUM phaT/
303a3(nyi): sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas btab na// gang banyab gnas nas 'pho bar 'gyur// rgya shug phur pa sor bdun la// ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ nyi shu rtsa bdun sngags bzlas la/
303a4(nyi): dpung gi nang du btab pa na// thams cad ga nyid kyis non par 'gyur// phyung na de bzhin thar bar 'gyur// star ka'i phur pa sor drug la// u tsu sa ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ lan stong
303a5(nyi): bzlas te btab gyur na// grong khyer mdun nam khang pa'i sgor// gnas po'i gnas sam lam chen nam// gtsug lag khang gi sgor btab na// bud med dang ni grogs rgod
303a6(nyi): dang / bu mo dge slong bram ze'am// rgyal po blon po 'bangs la sogs// thams cad bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// lcags kyi phur sor bcu gnyis la// sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT
303a7(nyi): ces/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas la// ri dang nags tshal stug po 'am// sman ljongs gnas su de btab na// gter rnams thams cad khugs par 'gyur// gnod sbyin
303b1(nyi): dag gis bcad pa yi// sgo nams kyang ni 'byed par nus// bdag gis khyim bzhi 'jug cing gnas// nyi ma bdun nam gsum gyi bar// las rnams shin tu btud la bya// zangs
303b2(nyi): las byas pa'i phur pa ni// sor ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// na ma sa ma da be re be re hUM phaT/ lan stong bar du bzlas brjod byas// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas dkri// bgegs rnams gnas
303b3(nyi): pa'i sar btab na// bi na yag la sogs rnams// thams cad bcings shing non par 'gyur// bdag la sdang bar sems pa rnams// bskal pa'i bar du bcings par 'gyur//
303b4(nyi): lcags sna lnga yi phur pa ni// sor ni brgyad pa'i tshad du bya// mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brgya bcu'i bar du gsang sngags bzlas// du ru ka dang til mar gyis// bskas te byang phyogs
